analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa
dhamma paccanīya
na hetum na vipākam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipāke ekaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipāke eka
na hetum na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na aupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na anupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na anupādinna anupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na sa vitakka sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na a vitakka vicāra mattam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na a vitakka avicāram dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava
na hetum na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na hetum na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipākam natthi

original: Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na hetum na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe sabbattha nava vipākam natthi
